application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1-T.5 Ash - Re-pollard to previous points.T.6 Evergreen Oak - Pollard by 4m.T.7 Sycamore - Crown reduce by 3m to reshape crown.T.8 Sycamore - Crown reduce by 3m to reshape crown.T.9 Sycamore - Crown reduce by 3m to reshape crown.
decision_conditions: T.1-T.5 Ash - Re-pollard to previous points.T.6 Oak - 2m Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points.T.7 Sycamore - 3m Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.8 Sycamore - 3m Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.9 Sycamore - 3m Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points & deadwood.

Inspection: Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment: The proposed works would produce an uneven canopy due to the extent of the lateral reduction and exspose the tree to unncessry wounding. Recommendation: Refuse.

The submitted block plan does not show the proposed development in hatched or shaded.Please provide a Proposed Block Plan to show the proposed development in hatched or shaded drawn at an identified standard metric scale (such as 1:200 or 1:500) showing the proposed works (hatched or shaded) in relation to the existing dwelling, site boundaries and any outbuildings on site. The Block Plan must show the direction of North and should also show adjoining properties to the side and rear and those opposite in full outline.
